LanguageData.Cassowary.label: cassowary
LanguageData.Cassowary.description: A large flightless bird with brightly-colored feathers. While it looks beautiful, its kick is vicious. It's known for being quick to aggression when harmed by violence or confronted by incompetent animal tamers.
LanguageData.Cassowary.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.Cassowary.tools.1.label: beak
LanguageData.Cassowary.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.Meat_Cassowary.label: MeatLabel
LanguageData.Corpse_Cassowary.label: CorpseLabel
LanguageData.Emu.label: emu
LanguageData.Emu.description: A large flightless bird with beady eyes on its ugly face. With its bad attitude, it is the jerk of the natural world. Bother it, and it is guaranteed to seek revenge.
LanguageData.Emu.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.Emu.tools.1.label: beak
LanguageData.Emu.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.Meat_Emu.label: MeatLabel
LanguageData.Corpse_Emu.label: CorpseLabel
LanguageData.Ostrich.label: ostrich
LanguageData.Ostrich.description: The largest unmodified bird species, ostriches are known for their fast run, huge eggs, and powerful kick. It is easily angered.
LanguageData.Ostrich.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.Ostrich.tools.1.label: beak
LanguageData.Ostrich.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.Meat_Ostrich.label: MeatLabel
LanguageData.Corpse_Ostrich.label: CorpseLabel
LanguageData.Turkey.label: turkey
LanguageData.Turkey.description: A short, fat, flightless bird known for its hilarious 'gobbling' call. It has been long domesticated, but also lives in the wild.
LanguageData.Turkey.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.Turkey.tools.1.label: beak
LanguageData.Turkey.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.Meat_Turkey.label: MeatLabel
